mapper.select: select ma_bang_luong, bang_luong.ma_nhan_vien, nhan_vien.ho_ten, tong_phu_cap, tong_khau_tru, tong_luong, tong_luong_thuc_nhan, thang, nam from bang_luong JOIN nhan_vien on bang_luong.ma_nhan_vien = nhan_vien.ma_nhan_vien

WITH CTE_Luong AS ( SELECT CASE WHEN tong_luong < 10000000 THEN '<10' WHEN tong_luong BETWEEN 10000000 AND 20000000 THEN '10-20' WHEN tong_luong BETWEEN 20000000 AND 30000000 THEN '20-30' ELSE '>30' END AS muc_luong, ma_nhan_vien FROM bang_luong ) SELECT muc_luong, COUNT(ma_nhan_vien) AS so_nhan_vien FROM CTE_Luong GROUP BY muc_luong ORDER BY CASE WHEN muc_luong = '<10' THEN 1 WHEN muc_luong = '10-20' THEN 2 WHEN muc_luong = '20-30' THEN 3 ELSE 4 END

SELECT to_char(make_date(nam, thang, 1), 'YYYY-MM') AS thang_nam, SUM(tong_luong_thuc_nhan) AS tong_luong_thuc_nhan FROM bang_luong WHERE ma_nhan_vien = #{maNhanVien} GROUP BY nam, thang ORDER BY nam, thang

select ma_bang_luong, bang_luong.ma_nhan_vien, nhan_vien.ho_ten, tong_phu_cap, tong_khau_tru, tong_luong, tong_luong_thuc_nhan, thang, nam from bang_luong JOIN nhan_vien on bang_luong.ma_nhan_vien = nhan_vien.ma_nhan_vien where bang_luong.ma_nhan_vien = #{maNhanVien}
